Soul in the Horn is a global movement with a core mission to lift the collective vibration. The movement originated in NYC as a collaborative vision between music curator DProsper and DJ Natasha Diggs. What began as a dance party, social gathering, and live music showcase has evolved into a global movement & music platform elevating artists, dancers, and music lovers around the world. @soulinthehorn

â«¸ About Glitterbox Â· @glitterboxibiza

Glitterbox is a nightlife phenomenon and record label conceptualized in 2014 by Simon Dunmore, founder of house music institution Defected Records. Since its inception, Glitterbox has generated an inclusive, uplifting party atmosphere designed to unite all ages, persuasions and walks of life on the dancefloor. Hosting events at world renowned venues, Glitterbox calls on the worldâ€™s most respected DJs such as Louie Vega, Kenny Dope, Jayda G, Bob Sinclar, Dimitri From Paris, Honey Dijon, Purple Disco Machine, Horse Meat Disco, Moodymann, Folamour and more. Rising stars of the scene Gina Breeze, Kiddy Smile, Natasha Diggs, DJ Holographic, Dirty Channels also join us alongside PAs from disco titans Kathy Sledge, Jocelyn Brown, Barbara Tucker and songstress RÃ³isÃ­n Murphy. Moving mind, body and soul, the partyâ€™s dancers, performers and world class production collide to create unforgettable moments across the globe. Powering dancefloors at venues such as Ibiza super club HÃ, Londonâ€™s Printworks, The Warehouse Project, Creamfields, IVY Sydney, Tomorrowland, Rex Club in Paris and New Yorkâ€™s iconic House of Yes, the award-winning imprint continues to be an authoritative voice for 21st century disco and truly a force to be reckoned with in global nightlife culture.

â«¸ About House of Yes Â· @houseofyesnyc

House of Yes is an internationally renowned performance-fueled nightclub based in Bushwick, Brooklyn. Since opening in 2015 it has become a destination for creative culture and outrageous dance parties that spark joy and inspire self-expression. Dubbed by the New York Times as a â€œrevolution in New York nightlife,â€ House of Yes is renowned for producing exceptional nightlife experiences, dance parties, cabaret shows, and theatrical spectacles that defy categorization and transcend genre.

â«¸ About 99 Scott & Associated Â· @associatednyc

99 Scott is a large-scale multi-room venue run by Associated and located in the heart of Bushwick. This unique indoor-outdoor venue has been home to some of the best immersive House of Yes productions - from festivals to live shows to parties. Associated is a manifestation of the collective spirit, bringing together a symphony of music, dance, people, and cultures across a portfolio of state-of-the-art venues delivering unparalleled experiences in NYC.

title: HOUSE OF GROOVES: Eli Escobar All Night+Ultra Violet&Friends
excerpt:
Our monthly night of non-stop dance magic. Your home for grooves that make your body move.

House of Grooves is our love letter to the dance floor, the night where we invite the legendary Eli Escobar to play open-to-close all night long - every damn month!

Get off your phone, get in the groove, feel the vibe, dress to express, dance till dawn.

â«¸ LOOKS

MAIN ROOM

ELI ESCOBAR - All Night Long!

The now legendary Eli Escobar can work a dancefloor like no other. In a town full of club music heavyweights, Eli stands in a class of his own and shines through his style and flawless selections, spanning countless genres, eras, and energetic vibrations.

Whether your an OG Turntable Lab head whoâ€™s been listening to Eli for decades, a Tiki Disco Enthusiast, or a new convert - from the first time you hear him play, itâ€™s apparent youâ€™ve found something rare and special in a selector (which is exactly how we felt the first time we heard him).

Itâ€™s been our pleasure and honor to host Eli as the resident of HOUSE OF GROOVES, playing his All Night Long sets since 2019. Experience the effortless excellence of Eli as he swaps deep-house for techno, switching to disco, and slipping in a cheeky hip-hop break only to bring it all back with a four-to-the-floor NY house stomper.

â«¸ ABOUT THE RUST MUSIC

Through the time, energy and unique resources of our small team of dedicated staff and the valued support of many contributors, partners, and fans, The Rust Music is a record label, production company, talent agency and online publication based in New York City and operating throughout the country and beyond.

Through these channels we curate atypical electronic music, from experimental beats to psychedelic bass. title: BODEGA JAMS Â· Dominican Day Celebration
excerpt:
House Of Yes resident DJ and NYC DJ Ultra Violet brings you a day of Dominican celebration at House Of Yes.

Come celebrate Dominican culture in all of its forms, with live music from Afro Dominicano, DJ sets from Dominican-American DJs Dana Lu and Ultra Violet!

Bodegas are one of the fundamental backbones of the New York City community. We're here to play some music, but to also pay homage to our beloved Bodegas. May their shelves stay stocked, their music stay blasting, and their cats stay sleeping on the chips!

Afro Dominicano

Afro Dominicano is a Latin Fusion band which centers its music into what they call Afro Caribbean soul. They blend traditional folkloric roots music from the Dominican Republic such as Perico Ripiao, Palo, Merengue de Orquesta, Bachata with Afro-beats, reggae, calypso, samba, Funk, Punk rock, and other Caribbean rhythms.

Dana Lu

Dana Lu is a Dominican DJ and Producer. With her highly energetic sets and diverse tunes, Dana has gained recognition as a DJ and producer throughout the tristate area who continues to push the boundaries.

Ultra Violet

Ultra Violet is a Dominican-American DJ hailing from the Bronx, NY. With mixes full of nostalgia mixed in with different genres of music such as house, dembow, and disco, she takes you on a journey with every set. She currently has a monthly residency at the Onyx Room at the legendary House of Yes.
